lines.text: The issue's not whether you're paranoid, Lenny, I mean look at this shit, the issue is whether you're paranoid enough.
Are we still friends?
I don't know Lenny. You see, friendship is more than one person constantly doing favors for another.
Memories are meant to fade. They're designed that way for a reason.

See... I can get you what you want, I can. I can get you anything, you just have to talk to me, you have to trust me. You can trust me, 'cause I'm your priest, I'm your shrink... I am your main connection to the switchboard of the soul. I'm the magic man... Santa Claus of the subconscious. You say it, you think it, you can have it.
This is your life, right here, right now! It's real-time, you hear me, real time! Time to get real, not playback. You understand me?
I can't believe you had to give them the damn tape.
me and Faith in the hot tub on my birthday.
[Lenny takes the actual tape out of his jacket]
Are we impressed yet?
Yeah... pretty impressed.
Have you ever been in love with someone who didn't return that love?
Yeah, Lenny, I have.
It didn't stop you from loving them, right? Or being able to understand them or forgive them?
I guess.
You're a disappointment, Nero. But you know what disappoints me more?
Your sex life?

Only he doesn't know about me and Faith. So I say to myself, if I turn the job down, he just gets somebody else. And I lose Faith... to coin a phrase. So to buy time, I do the skank. I still gotta do something about Tran... I figure it's him or me... but I can't cap him without a chump to take the fall. And who better than his girlfriend's loser ex-boyfriend... a known criminal... who has been seen hassling them in public numerous times.
And who was, regrettably, also your best fucking friend.
No plan is perfect, Lenny. Hey, cheer up. World's gonna end in ten minutes anyway.
Look... everyone needs to take a walk to the dark end of the street sometimes, it's what we are.
One man's mundane and desperate existence is another man's Technicolor.
His ass is so tight, when he farts only dogs can hear it.
You know one of the ways movies are still better than playback? The music comes up, there's credits, and you always know when it's over.
[turns to look at Lenny]
IT'S OVER!

[to a SQUID-recording-newbie]
I can use this, it's not bad, but, listen honey, you've got to move your eyes slower next time, much much slower. Like... like you're making love with your eyes, ok?

You're some piece of work, Lenny Nero. You're just calmly backstroking along in the big toilet bowl and somehow you never let it touch you. I mean, between working vice and your current so-called occupation, you must have seen every kind of perversion. But you're just like... some teflon man, you still come out this goofball romantic.
It's my sword and my shield, Mace.
Now, just so the, the rest of us know how much time is left, when is the rapture supposed to hit exactly? Is it midnight New Year's Eve?
That's right.
Aha. Is that midnight L.A. time or, or Eastern Standard Time, or what? I mean, what timezone is God in anyway?
I didn't know you were color blind, Max.
It was the only way I could stand your ties.

You know what? You've pulled over the wrong black man, Officer Steckler! I'm the 800 pound gorilla in your mist, fucker! I make more money in a day than you make in a whole year! And my lawyer loves sending sorryass Aryan RoboCop fuckers like you to jail!
This is not like "TV-only-better"... this is life.
I like the feeling of someone watching me.
I am the magic man. I am your link to the subconscious. I have what you want. I can get you what you can't have.
Paranoia is just reality on a finer scale.
The only time a whore should open her mouth is when she is giving head.
Right now his frontal lobes are like two runny eggs.
You put that thing on the 11 o'clock news and by midnight you'll have the biggest riot in history. They'll see the smoke from Canada.
The issue isn't whether you're paranoid, but whether you're paranoid enough.
Well, I've lost my appetite.
[Throws food away]
For about a year.
You wanna watch or you gonna do?

[during introduction to his music video]
You make me think I did this to myself. But the drugs' I smoke and the guns' I tote came from your shelf.
[while immersed in a virtual reality session]
[smiles]
Oooh... a little B&E action.
[car has been riddled with bullets; antagonists are about to incinerate the vehicle]
[with cell phone in hand]
911 is busy!

When I met Faith, she was just another runaway, giving twenty dollar blowjobs to buy crack. Just another lost soul. But she had this voice... it was scary, like she could take all the hurt and rage of the entire world and lift it up to Heaven in one voice. I helped her. And I promised her I'd always just be there, to protect her. See, it's not about what's in her head, it's what's in mine. I can't let go of the promise. It's like it's all I have left.
You love that red, white, and blue, but you hate that black, black, black.
Nero.
Strickland.
Commissioner Strickland!
See, since you shit-canned my career, I don't even have to call you sir. One of life's small pleasures.
Cheer up. The world's about to end in ten minutes anyway.
This tie cost more than your entire wardrobe... it's the one thing that stands between me and the jungle.
Two million years of human evolution and that's the best idea you can come up with.
Bullet-resistant? What ever happened to bullet-proof?
He's still workin' the party... actin' smooth like nothin's nothin'.
This is what we laughingly refer to as a plan, right?
[first lines]
Yeah, boot it.
[last lines]
Hey, Lenny, we made it!
Yea, we did.
You should get going.
Yea, see you downtown.
See you there.
a nigga with enough political juice to squash your ass like a stinkbug! You gonna be famous, fucker!
Jesus Lenny, you scared the fuck out of me!
